text: Pentyrch Rugby Football Club is a Welsh rugby union club based in Pentyrch in Wales. Pentyrch RFC is a member of the Welsh Rugby Union and is a feeder club for the Cardiff Blues. Pentrych RFC source their playing team mainly from local members of the community and also run a second team, veteran team, youth team and mini and junior section from age group Under-7's to Under-16's. ==Club honours== * 2008/09 WRU Division Four South East - Champions ==Past players of note== * Tom Lewis * Robin Sowden-Taylor * Harry Robinson * Seb Davies ==References== Category:Rugby clubs established in 1882 Category:Welsh rugby union teams
title: Pentyrch RFC
